name: It's About Thyme
description:
It’s About Thyme is a 2D puzzle-platformer with a funky, colorful aesthetic in which you control a Thyme Bandit: a member of an organization of thieves who steal thyme! Use your ability to time travel between the past and present to escape the warehouse before the staff gets back!

CONTROLS

  • WASD to move
  • Space to jump
  • Shift to Timeswitch
  • E to pick up/drop objects
  • Q to advance text

THE TEAM

  • Pete Cimino - Level Design, Environment Art, Character Art and Animations, Additional Scripting
  • Ethan Godwin - UI Design/Art, Sound Design, Writing, Additional Environment Art
  • Weston Wright - Key Scripting and Game Polish

CREDITS

Audio:

  • Final Cut Pro Sound Effects Library
  • "lose" by milton on freesound.org
  • "Button Click 1" by Mellau on freesound.org
  • "menu change" by leszek-szary on freesound.org
  • "loop run for your life 00" by littlerobotsoundfactory on freesound.org
  • "victory sound 2" by silverillusionist on freesound.org
  • "short jump swoosh" by Robinhood76 on freesound.org

Fonts:

  • Fresh Marker by John Gauthier
  • Magic Dreams by Figuree Studio
